content.text: Hey, my name is John.
Hey John, my name is Ryan.
Nice to meet you Ryan. What do you do for work?
I'm an international business man.
Oh, that sounds really interesting. What's your favorite part of the job?
I get to travel all over the world.
That's awesome! I love traveling. Where's your favorite place you've been?
I'd have to say Italy. The food, the culture, the people - it's all amazing.
I've always wanted to go to Italy. I've heard great things about it.
You should definitely go! It's one of the most beautiful countries in the world.
I definitely will. What are some of your other interests?
I love to read, I'm a big fan of American literature.
That's cool. I'm a big fan of English literature myself.
Awesome! What are some of your favorite authors?
I love Charles Dickens, Jane Austen, and William Shakespeare.
Nice! I love Charles Dickens too. He's one of my favorite authors.
Me too! He's such a great writer.
Yeah, he really is.
So, what are you doing for your birthday?
I'm spending time with my kids and family.
That sounds like a great way to spend your birthday
